Summary: Chevron - orb mild sort of a hum oscillating.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Martin
There were no other sightings in Martin on or around July 19th 2010
divs: sighting detailsabout 1:00 am give or take did not note time at on-set i was sitting on couch and at some point i noticed a sort of hum best to describe as follows take an old ceramic or glass jug blow across but not quite right as the note has not been struck just the slight low resonance below - before as you are searching to get the note it was pulsating oscillating in intensity not very loud not really distant i could not identify the noise and attributed to one of the kids'es tv on carton nw events dictated that i needed to go in to the hall about 45 min. later and the noise was still prevalent but the intensity was much less the oscillation appeared un-changed at this point i asked mt daughter whom was awake not feeling well said to me "what is that sound" i went afoot outside to look as it was not inside and tuned in a location west slightly south in a tree line west of a field behind the house to the west i noticed almost at ground level some lights went in and grabbed my field glasses and n\v vid and noticed on ground behind trees before a slight berm an blueish orb moving around at slight above ground level 5-6 foot and a thin black what appeared a bar - line about 12-18 ft long 2-3 ft high thin rectangle with light glowing underneath (reddish-orangeish) observed for a while then i shined a strong light at the direction and immediately the orb shot straight up slightly to west and light returned on rectangle and it went slowly up and i could see bottom and it was in reality a chevron shape three light bluish white and then a red one came on in middle of bottom it maneuvered a bit and just went up following orb off in the horizon very very quickly looked like stars in about 1-1\2 min. noise gone not the first time this year seeing orbs around here like march was my first ever here or since 94 and 96 for every report i sent there is one or so that i just didnt. these orbs are really strange why so many in the past year more than ever if all or 1\3 of the sightings real then what is this what are these, i thing there needs to be much! more invested into these orbs sightings or what ever. me ps. the ir n\v video was all awash with bright light eventhough there wasnt much light impossible to see or record.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
